name: Machine vs. Nature
description:
SAM, the Somewhat Anxious Machine, was just not programmed to like the outdoors. Help him get to the end of his route without touching the walls or any organic objects! 

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys 

Tutorial Credit: 3D Unity Course by the GameDev.tv Team on Udemy.

(This game was created as a 3D prototype for the MyFirstGameJam 2022! The assets, UI, and game design will be refurbished and updated over time.)
